title: Folding Fan, 1985-89-1, 1900–05
medium: Medium: silk, wood, horn, metal,, metal spangles
inscribed: Fan is signed Duvelleroy on the back of one slip.
description: Single leaf: (arch shape) Green net appliqued with green silk and applied gold metallic spangles in a variety of shapes. Sticks: Blond horn, incised and painted with simple flower design, painted wooden slips, metal ring and paste jewels at rivet.
